Pray.com | Los Angeles, CA | ONSITE, FULL-TIME

Open positions: Data Scientist, Full-Stack Engineer, Senior Android Developer, Senior Back-End Engineer, Senior Data Engineer, Senior Front End Software Engineer, Senior iOS Developer, Senior Product Manager, UI/UX Designer

Pray.com is a social impact company: we’re driven by a mission to help solve society’s challenges by creating tools that make people’s lives better. We walk the talk, live the dream, and combine our talents to build something bigger than ourselves. Our team is comprised of people from all kinds of backgrounds – some of us pray, some of us meditate, and some of us just want to see more empathy in the world. We all feel fortunate to be here. As a product, Pray is a private social network and donations platform for non-profits and faith organizations. We make it easy for people to connect with their communities, get involved face-to-face, and provide support in times of need. We are dedicated to creating a world where everyone leaves a legacy of helping others.

If you are interested, please email sd@pray.com with your resume
